50 hours/week (teaching) x 52 weeks/year = 2600 hours/year
35 hours/week (teaching) x 52 weeks/year = 1820 hours/year
15 hours/week (coaching) x 52 weeks/year = 780 hours/year
Total hours worked per year = 2600 + 1820 + 780 = 3700 hours/year

Now, we can calculate her annual salary:

$20 per hour (teaching) x 1820 hours/year = $4000 per year
$30 per hour (coaching) x 780 hours/year = $940 per year
Total annual salary = $4000 + $940 = $4040 per year

The Answer is: $4040 per year.
